mapper.select: select * from (select rownum r, a.* from (select * from studyboard ORDER BY STUDYBOARD_ID DESC) a )b WHERE r BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
select ROWNUM r, a.* FROM (select * from studyboard where STUDYBOARD_TITLE like #{studyBoard_title} or STUDYBOARD_CONTENT like #{studyBoard_title} ORDER BY STUDYBOARD_ID desc) a
mapper.insert: insert into STUDYBOARD(studyboard_id, studyboard_member_id, studyboard_title, studyboard_content, studyboard_filename, studyboard_viewcount, studyboard_write_dt, studyboard_deleteyn) VALUES(STUDYBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{Study_m.member_id} ,#{studyBoard_title} ,#{studyBoard_content}, #{studyBoard_fileName},0, SYSdate,'N')
mapper.update: update STUDYBOARD set studyboard_title= #{studyBoard_title},studyboard_content=#{studyBoard_content}, studyboard_filename=#{studyBoard_fileName}, studyboard_write_dt=sysdate where studyboard_id = #{studyBoard_id}
update STUDYBOARD set STUDYBOARD_DELETEYN= 'Y' where studyboard_id = #{studyBoard_id}
mapper.insert: update STUDYBOARD set STUDYBOARD_VIEWCOUNT= STUDYBOARD_VIEWCOUNT+1 where STUDYBOARD_ID=#{studyBoard_id}
